incidents.name: WhatsApp Inbound messages are delayed.

incident_updates.body: This incident with WhatsApp inbound messages delayed has now been resolved.
Engineers identified a spike in messages delayed in being sent from Meta to Twilio from 1:00 PM PST to 1:21 PM PST.  Those messages have been resent and successfully processed.

A WhatsApp issue with inbound messages has been identified. Customers may have experienced issues in receiving WhatsApp messages. Our engineers are working to get this resolved. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Twilio Accounts may not be Able to Capture Speech Using Gather

incident_updates.body: We have observed full recovery from the Speech Recognition issue in the US1 region that affected a small portion of calls using Gather. The incident is now resolved.

We are observing recovery from the Speech Recognition issue in the US1 region that affected a small portion of calls using Gather. We will continue monitoring and provide another update within 2 hours or sooner if there are any changes.

We are observing recovery from the Speech Recognition issue in the US1 region that affected a small portion of calls using Gather. We will continue monitoring and provide another update within 30 minutes or sooner if there are any changes.

We are continuing to address an issue with Speech Recognition in the US1 region that may affect a small portion of calls using Gather. Users will experience increased delays when using Gather Speech. Our engineers are working closely with our provider to fully resolve the problem. We will share another update within 2 hours or sooner if more information becomes available.

We have detected a potential issue with Speech Recognition in us1 region. This will potentially impact a small portion of calls capturing speech using Gather. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Elevated Errors Preventing Modification to Call Recordings

incident_updates.body: For a subset of calls from 16:24-16:33 UTC on September 24, 2025, Twilio accounts may not be able to start, stop, pause or resume a call or conference recording via the Recordings API, or be able to modify an in-progress call using the Calls API. The issue has now been resolved.
